app.description: Sa3dny connects households with vetted specialists for cleaning, nursing, elderly care, and upholstery care across Egypt.

footer.description: A trusted platform that blends Arabic hospitality with modern technology for every home service.

forms.name: Full name
forms.uploadPrompt: Drag & drop or click to upload

housekeeping.name: Housekeeping
housekeeping.description: Deep cleaning, recurring visits, and move-in readiness.

nursing.name: Nursing
nursing.description: Nurses for post-operation care, injections, and monitoring.

elderly.name: Elderly Care
elderly.description: Companionship, medication reminders, and light assistance.

carpets.name: Carpets & Upholstery
carpets.description: On-site carpet, sofa, and mattress cleaning.

svc-deep-clean.summary: Eco-friendly deep cleaning with full kitchen and bathroom coverage.
svc-deep-clean.description: A meticulous deep clean using eco-friendly products across high-touch areas, kitchen, bathrooms, and balconies.

svc-quick-visit.summary: Fast tidy-up focused on high-traffic spaces.
svc-quick-visit.description: A focused session for living areas and entries with the option to schedule recurring weekly visits.

svc-post-op.description: Certified nursing support for wound care, medication, and vitals monitoring with doctor coordination.

svc-daily-check.summary: Daily health check for medication and vitals.
svc-daily-check.description: Routine health checks covering medication reminders, blood pressure, and sugar tracking.

svc-elderly-day.summary: Day companion for elderly care and updates.
svc-elderly-day.description: Companionship, light movement help, meal preparation, and family updates during the day.

svc-elderly-night.summary: Overnight observation for peace of mind.
svc-elderly-night.description: Night companion ensuring safety checks, rest support, and attentive observation.

svc-carpet.summary: Steam clean carpets with anti-bacterial finish.
svc-carpet.description: Professional steam treatment for carpets with anti-bacterial protection and stain targeting.

svc-sofa.summary: Refresh sofas and mattresses with quick drying.
svc-sofa.description: Upholstery refresh that treats stains and leaves fabrics fresh and ready within hours.

home.heroTitle: On-demand home services, trusted and transparent
home.heroSubtitle: Sa3dny connects you to vetted workers for cleaning, nursing, and elderly care with clear pricing and real-time tracking.
home.trusted: Trusted by families across Cairo & Giza

steps.title: Browse & choose
steps.description: Pick a category, select a service, and review highlights with transparent pricing.

steps.title: Confirm & pay
steps.description: Pay online or upload Instapay proof. Our team validates payments instantly.

steps.title: Track in real time
steps.description: Follow the order timeline from assignment to completion, then leave a review.

about.title: About Sa3dny
about.mission: We merge Arabic hospitality with reliable technology to simplify every home service.
pillars: Workers are background checked and continuously rated.
Platform share is transparent: 25% platform, 75% workers.
Customer support can intervene, confirm payments, and reassign quickly.
about.vision: A bilingual experience where families feel supported, informed, and in control.

items.a: All workers are identity-verified, background-checked, and trained on client safety, service quality, and customer care standards.
Pay online or via Instapay. Instapay uploads are reviewed by customer support before assigning a worker.
Yes, create a recurring booking for weekly or monthly visits. Schedules can be paused or updated anytime from your dashboard.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: We respond in Arabic and English. Tell us what you need.

auth.redirectNote: After login you'll be redirected to {{path}}

settings.policyHint: Write a short service policy visible to users.

client.idRequirement: Upload front and back of your national ID before your first booking.

rev-1.comment: The team was punctual and meticulous. Great care with the kitchen appliances.

rev-2.comment: Nurse Samir followed the doctor's plan perfectly. Minor delay in arrival.

rev-3.comment: Removed old stains and smelled fresh. Would book again.

ORD-1201.reason: Proximity to New Cairo and recent 5-star streak in housekeeping.

ORD-1202.reason: Certified nurse, handled 12 similar post-op orders this month.
